definition[0]: to say that you firmly believe that something is true or good because of your experience or knowledge of it
example[0]: I’ll vouch for the quality of the report. I read it last night.
example[1]: ‘Where were you on the night of the murder?’ ‘In bed with flu. My wife can vouch for that.’
definition[1]: to say that you believe that someone will behave well and that you will be responsible for their behaviour, actions etc
example[2]: Why don’t you phone my office? They’ll vouch for me.
